education.studyType: Associate's degree, Business Administration and Management, General

work.summary: A senior technical support engineer who provided troubleshooting, configuration, and administration services involving web server configuration, domain name service updates, content distribution network configuration, load balancing configuration and management, and Google Search Appliance administration.
highlights: Provided technical support to clients by identifying and resolving hardware or software issues
Monitored network activity and identified performance issues that may need to be addressed by IT support staff
Coordinated and participated in team meetings to discuss new technology initiatives
Diagnosed and resolved IT-related problems in an organization, including virus issues, forgotten passwords, and software updates
Installed, configured, and tested computer hardware and software
Provided advanced level technical support for escalated customer issues
Supported customers per the details contained in the customer maintenance and support contracts
Maintained a high level of customer satisfaction through professionalism
Recommended, developed, and implemented workplace endpoint technology initiatives
Worked with other IT staff in installing, maintaining, and troubleshooting technical equipment

work.summary: A full stack JavaScript developer who developed both client and server software using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, Node.js and MongoDB.
highlights: Developed and maintained web services and interfaces using front-end and back-end technologies
Built new product features or APIs using best practices and design principles
Performed tests, troubleshoot software, and fixed bugs using various tools and frameworks
Developed and maintained web services and interfaces using front-end and back-end technologies
Built new product features or APIs using best practices and design principles
Performed tests, troubleshoot software, and fixed bugs using various tools and frameworks
Created identity verification applications using Node.js, Google Cloud's Google Vision SDK, and Azure's Face API
Implemented facial recognition and optical character recognition for extracting text from government-issued identifications
Used Google's CDN to distribute user verification status and decrease server load
